title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When I set an alias for columns in a data set, the expression builder still shows the old column names when I select the dataset.
EB: After setting an alias for columns in a data set, the expression builder should display the updated column names when selecting the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new data source and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
